primevc.gui.events.MouseSignals

type
class
extends
primevc.core.dispatcher.Signals
subclasses
primevc.avm2.events.MouseEvents
Cross-platform mouse events.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

click(getClick,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when the a user presses and releases a button of the user's pointing device over the same InteractiveObject.

doubleClick(getDoubleClick,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when the a user double-clicks on an InteractiveObject.

down(getDown,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when the mouse button is pressed

move(getMove,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when the mouse has moved

outOfChild(getOutOfChild,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when a mouse moves out of the interactive object, or a child of the object. In Flash 9+ (default,null) this is a proxy to flash.events.MouseEvent.MOUSE_OUT

overChild(getOverChild,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when a mouse moves over the interactive object, or a child of the object. In Flash 9+ this is a proxy to flash.events.MouseEvent.MOUSE_OVER

rollOut(getRollOut,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when a mouse moves out of the hitarea of the interactive object. In Flash 9+ this is a proxy to flash.events.MouseEvent.ROLL_OUT

rollOver(getRollOver,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when a mouse moves over the hitarea of the the interactive object. In Flash 9+ this is a proxy to flash.events.MouseEvent.ROLL_OVER

scroll(getScroll,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when a mouse scrollwheel is used.

up(getUp,null) : MouseSignal

Fires when the mouse button is released

Instance Methods hide inherited show inherited

dispose() : Void

overrides primevc.core.dispatcher.Signals

unbind(listener : Dynamic, ?handler : Dynamic) : Int

inherited from primevc.core.dispatcher.Signals
returns
number of handlers that were unbound.
see
Signal.unbind
Uses reflection to find all IUbindable properties of this class and forwards the arguments to them.
